entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023
